titles.title: A resolution expressing support for designation of the third Tuesday in November as "National Entrepreneurs' Day".
A resolution expressing support for designation of the third Tuesday in November as "National Entrepreneurs' Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Expresses support for the designation of National Entrepreneurs Day.
